strapiPost.title: To Going Outside
strapiPost.content:
Get ready to party with beardedgoat, because they’re ready for you. 

  • Discounts: To kick off the fall, beardedgoat is offering everyone 15% off their entire purchase when they go to the store on the Fayetteville Square.
  • Party: A few months ago beardedgoat moved its Flagship Store + Design Offices to the Square and have since partnered with local woodworkers and a muralist to make it cool and comfy inside. So go save some money by checking out the space! Grab a cold one while you’re there. Try things on. Make it a whole thing. 

Learn more about beardedgoat HERE.
